page.description: Swaps the data in two rows in a Repeating Section. Id is the id of the Repeating Section.

argument.name: id
argument.description: Id of the repeating section used as a source

argument.name: row1
argument.description: The row containing data to move to row2.

argument.name: row2
argument.description: The row containing data to move to row1.

ref.link: Swapping and Moving Rows in a Repeating Section

see.ref: Swapping and Moving Rows in a Repeating Section
